jobs.title: Senior Onboarding Engineer
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Mangomint

Mangomint is a fast-growing SaaS company on a mission to make every salon and spa more profitable. We are already the highest-rated salon and spa software in the US and Canada with thousands of customers and seek to become the #1 market leader in the coming years.

We’re a fully remote, fun, and ambitious team and get together every few months in person. As we grow, we’re looking to attract high-potential individuals who want to be part of a winning team. If that’s you, come join us!

About the Role

As a Senior Onboarding Engineer at Mangomint, you’ll play a critical role in shaping how new users experience our product from day one. You’ll work across both customer-facing onboarding flows and internal tools that help our team onboard new clients more effectively. In this role, you’ll partner closely with our Sales and Onboarding teams to design intuitive, elegant, and impactful onboarding experiences that improve activation, time-to-value, and retention.

This role offers a unique opportunity to own high-impact surface areas and build features that define first impressions of Mangomint.

In the Senior Onboarding Engineer role at Mangomint you will:

  • Work with Sales and Onboarding to build internal tooling and scalable solutions for users first interaction with our platform

  • Design and implement user onboarding experiences — from first login through setup, education, and activation

  • Collaborate with Design and Product to create intuitive flows that help new users find value quickly and confidently

  • Help improve engineering standards, tooling, and practices for frontend development

Technologies You Will Work With

  • Frontend: JavaScript, Node, Playwright, Ramda, React

  • Backend/REST API: Kotlin/JVM, PostgreSQL, AWS (RDS, SQS, Lambda, EC2/EB)

  • Tooling & Testing: Docker, Jest, Pulumi

While experience with our exact stack is helpful, we care more about your engineering skills and your ability to quickly learn and adapt to new technologies.

What We’re Looking For

  • 5+ years of relevant experience

  • Strong understanding of the Document Object Model (DOM) tree

  • Proficiency in promise-based JavaScript for handling asynchronous operations

  • Strong product sense and an interest in how UX impacts user behavior and product adoption

  • Experience collaborating with cross-functional teams — including Product, Design, and Customer Success

  • A detail-oriented mindset with a passion for smooth, accessible, and responsive user experiences

  • Ability to balance speed and quality — shipping thoughtfully, but often

  • Experience working on onboarding or lifecycle features is a plus, but not required

What You'll Love About Us

  • Competitive compensation

  • Employee stock options

  • Comprehensive health coverage (health, dental, vision, life & disability)

  • Generous monthly wellness budget (gym, massage, etc.)

  • Premium Calm app & One Medical membership

  • Flexible, unlimited PTO

  • 401k, HSA and FSA plans available (no current match)

Mangomint is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate against any employee or job applicant on the basis of race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy, sexual orientation, and gender identity), national origin, age, disability and genetic information (including family medical history).

 - Generous monthly wellness budget (gym, massage, etc.)

 - Premium Calm https://www.calm.com/?pid=googleadwords_int&af_channel=googlesem&af_c_id=14668023573&af_adset_id=136070395885&af_ad_id=603377958418&af_siteid=g&af_sub_siteid=&af_keyword=kwd-316578326783&af_sub3=c&af_sub4=Cj0KCQiAkMGcBhCSARIsAIW6d0COoPkg49T2ESdqQlUlpJIF4KxYkRluepIYfFEFcGjSwxu10SAfBhoaAvuGEALw_wcB&utm_medium=paid&utm_source=googlesem&utm_campaign=14668023573&utm_content=homepage&utm_term=kwd-316578326783&gclid=Cj0KCQiAkMGcBhCSARIsAIW6d0COoPkg49T2ESdqQlUlpJIF4KxYkRluepIYfFEFcGjSwxu10SAfBhoaAvuGEALw_wcB app & One Medical https://www.onemedical.com/ membership

jobs.title: Account Executive - SMB (Salon & Spa Software)
jobs.descriptionHtml:
About Mangomint

Mangomint is a fast-growing SaaS company on a mission to make every salon and spa more profitable. We are already the highest-rated salon and spa software in the US and Canada with thousands of customers and seek to become the #1 market leader in the coming years.

We’re a fully remote, fun, and ambitious team and get together every few months in person. As we grow, we’re looking to attract high-potential individuals who want to be part of a winning team. If that’s you, come join us!

About the Role

Mangomint is looking for a results-driven, no-nonsense Account Executive to join our growing sales team. This role is for someone who genuinely enjoys connecting with small business owners — not just selling software. You’ll help salon and spa owners modernize how they run their businesses so they can become more profitable and confident operators.

If you thrive in a fast-paced, high-volume environment and can communicate with warmth, clarity, and hustle — you’ll fit right in.

What You’ll Do

  • Become an expert in Mangomint and the salon & spa industry so you can build trust instantly and advise owners with confidence

  • Own the full sales cycle from first touch to close — text, call, demo, and everything in between

  • Run concise, high-energy discovery and demo conversations that get to the heart of the customer’s needs

  • Manage a steady inbound pipeline efficiently and with urgency — no lead left waiting

  • Sell on value and outcomes, not technical specs

  • Collaborate closely with onboarding to ensure a seamless launch and great first impression for every customer

  • Go above and beyond your quota to help your teammates and the company succeed

What We’re Looking For

  • 1-2 years of full-cycle SMB SaaS sales experience, with proven success in short sales cycles (under 10 days)

  • You thrive in a high-velocity environment and can juggle many warm leads at once without dropping the ball

  • Excellent communicator with a conversational approach — you speak with people, not at them

  • Proven track record of excellence

  • Must embrace CRM data accuracy and accountability (we use Salesforce + Momentum.io to track activity and ensure nothing falls through the cracks)

  • Familiarity with salons, spas, or other service-based small businesses is a major plus

  • You bring energy, humility, and a bias for action every day

What You’ll Love About Mangomint

  • Competitive compensation

  • Employee stock options

  • Comprehensive health coverage (health, dental, vision, life & disability)

  • Generous monthly wellness budget (gym, massage, etc.)

  • Premium Calm app & One Medical membership

  • Flexible, unlimited PTO

  • 401k, HSA and FSA plans available (no current match)

Mangomint is an equal opportunity employer. We do not discriminate against any employee or job applicant on the basis of race, color, religion, sex (including pregnancy, sexual orientation, and gender identity), national origin, age, disability and genetic information (including family medical history).
